title: I don't know what just happened?
body: So I was in the middle of a norms game, and out of nowhere my game lags, hard. I try to keep playing around it, but then it starts freezing, over and over, off and on. AT some point I was able to move around but couldn't target anything, my teammates were beside me at one second then all the way over in the enemy's base the next. I then tried to close the client to restart it, league tried to update when I reloaded, then i was back online and the game was done. My internet connection is perfectly fine and I've never experienced anything like this before. My computer runs very well and I rarely ever experience difficulties while playing league. What just happened? And I'm 100% sure my teammates are going to report me, especially since 2/4 of them were being toxic all game without reason. I don't really think this is fair :/

replies.body:
It sounds like you were experiencing the common symptoms of [*Packet Loss*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Packet_loss), which occurs when the data packets that store you and other player's movements/actions are jumbled up and lost along the way. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers some common solutions for this, so I strongly recommend working through all the steps listed.

Let me know if you continue to have these issues after working through those steps.
Thank you. I left the computer off over night and everything seems fine now, I'm assuming it's an Autobot that fixes itself when it feels like it
She* and no, I have it connected straight to my tower
